info.name: Quotes-API
info.description:
This API allows you to manage a collection of quotes and authors. You can create, read, update, and delete quotes and authors through a RESTful interface.

**API Version**: V1.0.0

**Base URL**:[http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)
